overview: The guys are planning a skiing trip, but as they can't hit the slopes and the snow, they settle for some sexy threeway apres ski action instead, right there in the lounge. Whilst it can be a little boring sitting on the subs bench, two footballers make the most of their alone time in the locker room and they show off their balls skills to the max as they kiss, tease, suck and fuck until the full-time whistle blows. Who says you need to be on the pitch to score. They may not be dumb, but these handsome boys are definitely Young And Full Of Cum, and they can't wait to share it around.
title: Young and Full of Cum
